headline: Trane Technologies Recognized by TIME as One of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies
summary: SWORDS, Ireland, June 24, 2025--Trane Technologies (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, has been recognized in TIME’s list of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies, ranking 20th. The list, now in its second year and published in collaboration with market research company Statista, highlights the top 500 companies that embed sustainability into their core strategies.
